game.name: Garlic Builder
game.shortDescription: Garlic Builder is a unique building game. As the new builder of the Garlic Family, can you inherit your father's building hammer, take various orders, follow the blueprint, or use your imagination to fulfill the strange needs of your customers?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Garlic Builder is a unique building game. As the new builder of the Garlic Family, can you inherit your father's building hammer, take various orders, follow the blueprint, or use your imagination to fulfill the strange needs of your customers?

reviewHighlights.text: This game is so stinkin' cute. You're a little garlic guy who uses gathered materials like water, sapphire, dirt, and leaves to create pixelated items...
